name: JSON Crack
title: jsoncrack.com
shortDescription: JSON Crack is an open-source online tool designed to help users visualize and understand complex JSON data through interactive graphs. Users can upload JSON files, input data via URL, or type directly into a text editor. The tool automatically converts data into visual tree graphs, allowing for quick data comprehension. It supports multiple data formats including JSON, YAML, CSV, XML, and TOML, and offers features like data conversion, validation, and code generation. Ideal for developers and data analysts looking to simplify data handling and enhance readability.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Altair GraphQL Client
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Visual tool for GraphQL, not JSON
